name: AbcGame
description:
AbcGame (working title) is a small 'game' for kids age 5 and under. It was created with my niece and nephew in mind.

It is still a work-in-progress. As you can see from the "Themes" menu, I am working on a couple more themes, and plan on adding them in the near future. I also plan on releasing this project to iOS/Android soon.

Special thanks to @McFunkypants at #1GAM for motivating me to get this done.

Controls:

  • Click with the left mouse button to create / destroy objects.
  • Enter the "Themes" menu to select a different theme. Stop clicking and the menu button will appear.
  • Click with the right mouse button and then select "Go Fullscreen" to enter fullscreen mode. Press Escape to return.

Version History:

  • 2014.01.22 (v0.1.0) - Initial web release.
